channel.title: CVE Feed for Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) -- ArubaOS Wi-Fi Controllers and Campus/Remote Access Points
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) -- ArubaOS Wi-Fi Controllers and Campus/Remote Access Points

item.title: CVE-2024-25615|2024-03-05T20:19:54.342Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise%20%28hpe%29 -- arubaos%20wi-fi%20controllers%20and%20campus%2Fremote%20access%20points
item.description: An unauthenticated Denial-of-Service (DoS) vulnerability exists in the Spectrum service accessed via the PAPI protocol in ArubaOS 8.x. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability results in the ability to interrupt the normal operation of the affected service.
